mapper.select: SELECT F.FUNDING_TITLE , F.FUNDING_SUMMARY , F.FUNDING_CONTENTS , F.END_DATE , F.FUNDING_GOAL_MONEY , C.CATEGORY_NAME , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ORDER WHERE FUNDING_CODE = #{ code }) AS BUY_NUMBER , (SELECT SUM(ORDER_PRICE) FROM TBL_ORDER WHERE FUNDING_CODE = #{ code }) AS TOTAL_REV FROM TBL_FUNDING F JOIN TBL_CATEGORY C ON(F.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE F.FUNDING_CODE = #{ code }
SELECT TAG_NAME FROM TBL_TAG T JOIN TBL_FUNDING_TAG FT ON(T.TAG_CODE = FT.TAG_CODE) WHERE FT.FUNDING_CODE = #{ code }
SELECT OPTION_NAME , OPTION_CONTENTS , OPTION_PRICE , LIMIT_QUANTITY , OPTION_COLOR , OPTION_SIZE , DELIVER_DATE FROM TBL_FUNDING_OPTIONS WHERE FUNDING_CODE = #{ code }
SELECT FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME FROM TBL_FUNDING_FILE WHERE FUNDING_CODE = #{ code } AND FILE_TYPE = '상단'

SELECT B.FUNDING_CODE , B.FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME FROM (SELECT ROWNUM , A.FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME , A.FUNDING_CODE FROM (SELECT FF.FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME , FF.FUNDING_CODE FROM TBL_FUNDING_FILE FF JOIN TBL_FUNDING TF ON (FF.FUNDING_CODE = TF.FUNDING_CODE) WHERE FILE_TYPE = '메인' AND FF.FUNDING_CODE != #{code} AND TF.CATEGORY_CODE = #{categoryCode}) A) B WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
SELECT FUNDING_CODE FROM TBL_FUNDING_FILE WHERE FILE_MODIFICATION_NAME = 5af9b6b332e64fb593da12efb4b1ad58.jpg AND FILE_TYPE = '메인'
SELECT CATEGORY_CODE FROM TBL_FUNDING WHERE FUNDING_CODE = #{ code }
